features: Includes two (2) Colgate 360 Floss Tip Sonic Battery Powered Toothbrushes
Soft, floss-tip* bristles reach 4x deeper below the gumline** (*this toothbrush does not replace flossing, **vs. an ordinary flat-trim toothbrush)
A cheek, gum and tongue cleaner comfortably removes bad breath bacteria
Vibrating bristles on this sonic toothbrush deliver the cleaning power of 20,000 strokes per minute
1 AAA battery is included for each brush in this two pack of sonic toothbrushes
body.description: The Colgate 360 Floss Tip Battery Powered Toothbrush delivers a whole mouth clean. This sonic toothbrush features soft, floss-tip* bristles that reach 4x deeper below the gumline** for a deep yet gentle clean. Designed with sonic vibrations, this battery toothbrush for adults is perfect for travel. One AAA battery is included, so it can be used wherever you are. Jumpstart your oral care routine with this two pack. Get the most out of your battery powered toothbrush with soft activated, vibrating bristles that deliver the cleaning power of 20,000 strokes per minute. This toothbrush features our uniquely designed cheek and tongue cleaner and gives adults control of their oral health care needs with just a press of a button. As the soft bristles gently vibrate, they provide deep cleaning while enhancing a brighter smile. *this toothbrush does not replace flossing **vs. an ordinary flat-trim toothbrush

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I read all of the reviews so that you don't have to!
reviews.reviewText: I tried this toothbrush and read all of the reviews so that you don't have to:- Long-Lasting Battery: Customers are thrilled with the battery life. It reliably powers the toothbrush for up to three months, which aligns perfectly with the recommended toothbrush change interval.- Impressive Performance: Users rave about its effectiveness in cleaning teeth. The toothbrush seems to do an excellent job at removing plaque and leaving teeth feeling smooth. That was also my experience.- Ease of Use: The simplicity and convenience of this toothbrush are big wins. Its user-friendly design, including an easy-to-use on/off button, makes it a favorite.- Clumsiness-Free: Unlike some other battery-operated toothbrushes, this one is noted for its comfortable grip and non-clumsy handling. Personally, I think it feels good in my hand.- Travel-Friendly: Many appreciate its compact size, making it an excellent travel companion. It's both lightweight and efficient.- Cost-Effective: Despite its high quality, the toothbrush is considered an affordable luxury. Users find it a great value for the price.- Gentle yet Effective: The vibration strength is just right – powerful enough for a thorough clean but gentle enough to not harm teeth or gums.- Bristle Quality: The bristles, including silicone side bristles, are mentioned positively for their cleaning efficiency.- Battery Replacement: Users appreciate the convenience of being able to replace the batteries instead of needing to recharge the toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer in Dental Care!
reviews.reviewText: Before discovering the Colgate 360 Sonic Battery Powered Toothbrush, I used to stick to ordinary electric toothbrushes. I thought they were the best until I took a chance on this gem! Now, my older brushes are packed away, and the Colgate 360 Sonic reigns supreme in my daily routine.I can genuinely say I prefer this over any regular toothbrush. Its quality is unparalleled – sturdy yet comfortable to use. When I purchased it to accompany me on vacation, it was the perfect travel buddy – compact and efficient. I was taken aback by its performance; it exceeded all my expectations!The magic of a powered toothbrush has always appealed to me, but this? This is next level. It feels like the epitome of what a powered toothbrush should be. After every brush, my teeth feel impeccably clean, and my mouth has that refreshing zing! Gone are the days when I brushed too hard, unaware of the damage I was doing. With the Colgate 360 Sonic, I've found the balance of effective yet gentle cleaning.The best part? Such excellence doesn't even burn a hole in your pocket. It’s truly an inexpensive luxury! I've tried many brushes over the years, searching for "the one." I can confidently say, this is it. Great for both daily use and travel, the Colgate 360 Sonic is now an irreplaceable part of my oral care. Thank you, Colgate, for introducing me to the pinnacle of toothbrushes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They're quiet, work well and valued price point. Arrived quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good choice for the price
reviews.reviewText: My dental hygienist said to pick up theses toothbrushes for brushing. They're better than the standard toothbrush and not as pricey as the whole toothbrushing kits from like oral b.It's good enough for about 10 bucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dentist said that I was pressing too hard when I brushed and recommend this. It let's you know if you're pressing too hard because you can hear it in the little motor. You just lightly hold it on the tooth and it does the work for you by spinning, so basically, you don't have to worry about pressing too hard. The dentist was impressed at my next visit!! It's been great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Expected!
reviews.reviewText: Wow--for the price i am impressed! The bristles are soft, the high-speed vibration let's me know I'm getting a solid cleaning, and the light-weight and slim style let's me get to those back molars. I actually look forward to brushing now lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good battery life
reviews.reviewText: There are two toothbrushes in the pack. I used one on vacation and was genuinely surprised how well they brushed my teeth. I thought being battery operated I’d get 1- or 2 good brushes before the battery was flat, but that wasn’t a problem at all because it lasted the 11 days I was on vacation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price and performs well!
reviews.reviewText: Good price and performs very well. I'll now be using these as replacement tooth brushes.

I am glad to have learned that tooth-brushing can be this simple and effective.But angry that I took so long!This brush cleans your teeth almost the same as a dental hygienist.In between the teeth feels smooth, and it is light and simple and unobtrusive and compact.Excellent value for money!

We chance upon Colgate 360 degree electric toothbrush and we can tell you it is the best electric tooth brush that clean your tooth completely at a reasonable price ! I think in USA, there is an option in amazon US for auto stock replenishment and we hope to have this feature in Amazon Prime SG ! Thanks
This is a brilliant toothbrush, that is no longer available in Australia. Highly recommended

I've used this brand and style of toothbrushes for the last couple of years. They work great and are good value for money. The electric is easy on the teeth enamel and gums because you need only apply the lightest pressure to have teeth feel very clean.
